__e: It's a terrible thing to say, but by the time I came to Westeros, I didn't believe in our Lord.
I'm done with Westeros and Westeros is done with me.
And across the sea there is a person who hates the great lords of Westeros just as much as we do.
Ever since my parents died... I've jumped around from city to city, from continent to continent.
It must have been terrible for you, coming back from the Continent, discovering your mother had died.
I was with a law school buddy from the mainland, ...and I took him to the club.
